facility_type: programs sproviding weekly or monthly updates
notes: Records from page 5 of "Treatment Availability Database" PDF by DBHIDS. Updated 2-3x per week (Mon/Wed/Fri)! Could URL follow this formula based on the DATE in update_recency? https://dbhids.org/wp-content/uploads/[4-digit year]/[2-digit month]/TAD-[integer_month].[integer_date].[4-digit year].pdf
Data collection widened from Philadelphia to 15 mile radius. Ask DBHIDS and other target users about what further geographic range would be useful.
